CustomField.description: When checked, the Ticket Type is considered as a Tax Deductible contribution and the Cost of the Ticket Type will be used when deriving the "Tax Deductible Donation Amount" on Attendee's Receipts. Defaults unchecked.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When checked, the Ticket Type is considered as a Tax Deductible contribution and the Cost of the Ticket Type will be used when deriving the "Tax Deductible Donation Amount" on Attendee's Receipts. Defaults unchecked.
CustomField.label: Is Tax Deductible
